citation.article-title: Microterricola viridarii gen. nov., sp. nov., a new member of the family Microbacteriaceae.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Microterricola viridarii sp. nov.
Microterricola viridarii (vi.ri.da′ri.i. L. gen. n. viridarii of a pleasure-garden, the place where the type strain was isolated).
General morphological, chemotaxonomic and growth characteristics are as given above in the genus description.
Colonies are pale yellow in colour.
The temperature range for growth is 10–38 °C and the optimum range is 15–30 °C.

Glycerol, l-arabinose, d-ribose, aesculin, maltose and glycogen are utilized as carbon sources, but erythritol, d-arabinose, d- and l-xylose, d-adonitol, methyl β-d-xylopyranoside, d-galactose, d-glucose, d-fructose, d-mannose, l-sorbose, l-rhamnose, dulcitol, inositol, d-mannitol, d-sorbitol, methyl α-d-mannopyranoside, methyl α-d-glucopyranoside, N-acetylglucosamide, amygdalin, arbutin, salicin, cellobiose, d-lactose, melibiose, sucrose, trehalose, inulin, melezitose, raffinose, starch, xylitol, gentiobiose, turanose, d-lyxose, d-tagatose, d- and l-fucose, d- and l-arabitol, potassium gluconate, potassium 2-ketogluconate and potassium 5-ketogluconate are not utilized.
No growth occurs in the presence of 4 % (w/v) NaCl.

Cells are susceptible to tetracycline (30 μg), polymyxin B (300 U), amikacin (30 μg), chloramphenicol (30 μg), erythromycin (15 μg), norfloxacin (10 μg), ciprofloxacin (5 μg), tobramycin (10 μg), vancomycin (30 μg), kanamycin (30 μg), gentamicin (10 μg), ampicillin (10 μg), imipenem (10 μg) and ceftazidime (30 μg).

Leucine arylamidase, acid phosphatase, naphthol-AS-BI-phosphohydrolase and α-glucosidase are present, but alkaline phosphatase, lipase (C8), valine arylamidase, cystine arylamidase, trypsin, chymotrypsin, α-galactosidase, β-galactosidase, β-glucuronidase, N-acetyl-β-glucosaminidase, α-mannosidase and α-fucosidase are absent.
The predominant cellular fatty acid components are anteiso-15 : 0, anteiso-17 : 0, iso-16 : 0, iso-15 : 0 and 16 : 0.
The DNA G+C content of the type strain is 70 mol%.
The type strain is KV-677T (=NRRL B-24538T =NBRC 102123T), isolated from park soil in Tokyo (Japan).
